research_list.name: Nuro
research_list.reason: Nuro is garnering attention due to its recent collaboration with major retailers to expand its autonomous delivery service. This partnership aims to improve last-mile deliveries using self-driving vehicles, catering to the increasing demand for contactless shopping solutions. Nuro's innovative approach positions it at the forefront of the growing autonomous logistics market.

research_list.name: Cohere
research_list.reason: Cohere is in the spotlight after securing significant funding to enhance its AI language models, used in customer service automation and content generation, attracting interest amid rapid AI advancements. The company's technology is being utilized in various applications, from customer service automation to content generation, attracting interest amid the rapid advancements in AI capabilities and the race to develop competitive language models.
